TopicTitle: Make kerbals grow beards during extended flights.

Articles.Content: in a sea of serious suggestions its time for something a bit more silly. i decided kerbals need to have beard if they have been in space too long. capsule fever and such.

aleredy suggested, probbably not gonna happen.

i like the idea though.
Make it happen!
Some indication of how long a Kerbal has been in space would be nice, and something we don't have now. Doesn't necessarily have to be a beard, could be the green color fading over time.
KerBeards.... Do it... Do it NOW!
Some of the little dudes I've left on extended jaunts in space would pretty much have the whole capsule filled with beard.

Not a bad idea, actually. I also don't think it will be implemented but it is nice to imagine. Especially since I ran a mission which took Jeb 4000+ days not too long ago, I guess his helmet would be impenetrably full of his beard at the end

Mental health already has been declined and i agree that is not neccessary, but beards would be funny, yes! Or maybe they turn more blue due to constant radiation... Something to see the badass long space experience in a kerbals bulby eyes... I like that!
I once thought Kerbals might turn orange when they feel sick, such as when spinning rapidly and not enjoying it.
cosmetic changes would be neat. beards for time spent in space, spots for radiation near the sun, turning orange for high g-loads, turning white for letting jeb fly. ya know.

ever heard of razors?

And no, kerbals aren't humans so they don't have to have facial hair like humans.

I once thought Kerbals might turn orange when they feel sick, such as when spinning rapidly and not enjoying it.

LOL... another thing that could go over well.

Actually, visual feedback would be great. Purple when some of them get space sickness too.

Actually a medical status panel would be great for mission control. For example you have to bring them in from a space walk if they are doing a Dr Stone.

And no, kerbals aren't humans so they don't have to have facial hair like humans.

X-Kerbs!!! I want Kerberine, Koliath, Kystique and Kerbneto!!!

In general i find it nice to actually see, that you deal with an experienced spacetoughend kerbal. But this should for sure not end in IVA views with kerbals running through the rainbow spectrum...

better yet, their toenails... And they get bad breath too...

And sleep deprivation, and cabin fever. Which inevitably leads to RANDOM FAILURES!

What they really need for realism is turds floating around the cabin.

Yes, you read that right, Apollo 10 had big ol' doo-doos floating about, and yes, that's plural, it happened twice.

http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2013/04/11/poop-space-apollo-10-astronauts-turds-mission-nasa-transcripts_n_3054324.html

I think it'd be hilarious to have something like this. I appreciate that this would take some serious work, though. Maybe there's another solution, one that indicates that a Kerbal has been on a mission for a while in a way that is humorous.
